project1.title: Office Electrical Wiring
project1.description: Complete electrical wiring installation tailored to office needs and safety. We use modern materials that meet all quality standards.

project2.title: Shopping Mall Lighting
project2.description: Design and installation of modern lighting in a large shopping mall using energy-saving technologies. Increases lighting efficiency and reduces energy costs.

project3.title: Smart Home
project3.description: Integration of smart home systems with power automation to provide convenience and energy efficiency. Controlled via mobile app or voice commands.

project4.title: Industrial Installation
project4.description: Electrical installation solution for manufacturing facilities, considering high load and safety requirements.

project5.title: Facade Lighting
project5.description: Aesthetic and functional facade lighting for a business center that enhances security and the attractiveness of the building while creating a pleasant atmosphere.

project6.title: Switchboards
project6.description: Assembly, installation, and connection of distribution switchboards for commercial objects, ensuring reliable power supply according to the facility's specifications.

project7.title: Solar Panels
project7.description: Installation and connection of solar panels for autonomous energy supply to reduce electricity costs and increase energy efficiency.

project10.title: Electrical Switchgear Installation
project10.description: Professional installation and connection of electrical switchgear to ensure an uninterrupted power supply.

project12.title: House Wiring Upgrade
project12.description: A full range of work to replace old electrical wiring with a new, safe, and efficient network.

project13.title: CCTV System Installation
project13.description: Integration and connection of CCTV systems for security and access control.

project14.title: New Construction Electrical Work
project14.description: A complete cycle of electrical work in a new building, from design to project handover.
